mdufa 0.3.2
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Harmonize Metric Names Across MDUFA Periods

    harmonize_metric_names.Rd

    Standardizes performance_metric values across MDUFA periods to enable aggregation and plotting over time. Handles differences such as:

    • Asterisks and footnote markers (e.g., "Number Received*")

    • Period-specific wording (e.g., "MDUFA III decision")

    • Case variations (e.g., "FDA Days" vs "FDA days")

    • Minor variations in spacing, punctuation

    harmonize_metric_names(data)

    Arguments

    data

    MDUFA dataset with a performance_metric column

    Value

    Dataset with added metric_harmonized column containing the standardized metric name

    Examples

    library(dplyr)
mdufa3 |>
  harmonize_metric_names() |>
  select(performance_metric, metric_harmonized) |>
  distinct() |>
  head(10)
#> # A tibble: 10 × 2
#>    performance_metric                                          metric_harmonized
#>    <chr>                                                       <chr>            
#>  1 Number Received                                             Number Received  
#>  2 Closed before RTA action                                    Closed Before RT…
#>  3 Number with accepted RTA review                             Number With Acce…
#>  4 Number without a RTA Review and > 15 Days since Date Recei… Number Without A…
#>  5 Number without a RTA Review and <= 15 Days since Date Rece… Number Without A…
#>  6 Number Not Accepted for Filing Review                       Number Not Accep…
#>  7 Rate of submissions not accepted for filing review          Rate Of Submissi…
#>  8 Number Accepted                                             Number Accepted  
#>  9 Completed RTF                                               Completed RTF    
#> 10 Number Not Filed                                            Number Not Filed
